desc: A small dye studio with hand dyed wool fabrics in colorways from brights to primitives. We make our kits, design a few patterns and curate patterns, perle cotton and notions departments with the wool appliquer, hand embrodierer and crazy quilter in mind.

layout.text: Hand Dyed Wool & Cotton Fabrics & Threads

Artisan hand dyed, 100% wool and cotton fabrics along with threads are dyed into bright, clear colors or deeper, richer colors for wool and cotton applique, rug hooking, hand stitching, cross stitch, embroidery, Sashiko and more!
